settings.code:
{% for tag in product.tags%} {% if tag contains 'color' %} {% assign val = tag | split:'::' %} {% assign handle_val = val[2]%} {% assign color_val = val[1] | handle %} {% assign tag-file = color_val | append: ".png" %}
{% endif %} {% endfor %}

settings.title: Product Description
settings.content: Stay warm on any adventure with the ultimate traveling Thermal Wear. these Thermal wear will fit your Apricoat Set's perfectly on your cold adventures. sensible layers as a source of warmth, breathable, stretchy, and helps you sweat it out and let air in to keep you perfectly comfortable.

settings.title: Shipping Info
settings.content: Free World-Wide shipping on orders over $150 with a 14-day return policy & 30-day free exchanges every order. International duties & taxes may apply and are not calculated at checkout unless stated. Orders to US/CA ship within 1-2 business days, AU - 7-15 business days.

settings.title: Materials
settings.content:
made of 100% recycled materials
Composition: 54% nylon, 41% polyester, 5% spandex - Wicking fabric.

settings.title: Returns, Exchanges & Warranty
settings.content:
Not happy? No worries! We offer a 14-days return policy after the date of delivery. Need to exchange? no problem, no questions asked we have a 30 day free exchange policy.

You can do it right Here

We offer a 1-year warranty against manufacturing defects. All information can be found here on this page. Had a problem? Feel free to contact us directly via email at support@apricoat.com

Pre-order items and discounted-orders: Items purchased while on pre-order status or with 20%+ discount are nonrefundable. Don’t worry, though! You can still exchange them for a different size or return for store credit!

settings.title: See Features
settings.description: Move slider to change positions, Click circles to learn the feature.

settings.title: we had a dream
settings.description: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s.

settings.title: The beginning
settings.text: Apricoat was born from a group of international explorers who wanted to make the ultimate high-quality, eco-friendly traveling gear. For months, we researched, spoke with industry leaders, took it out field for extreme tests.

settings.title: Crowdfunding
settings.text: The $2.2M success of Apricoat's first crowdfunding campaign was the next step from a boutique one-product brand to a vision come true - a top-tier eco-friendly traveling gear brand with many traveling solutions that helps reach new limits.

settings.title: Young successful brand
settings.text: We had many obstacles on our way, from long designing periods to canceling some that were just not - enough. Today, we are proud to say - the hard work paid off. The ultimate thoughtful traveling gear is here to stay and extend.

settings.title: It’s all thanks to you
